title: Book Cover Font ID
content:
Hello,

I would be incredibly appreciative in any assistance identifying this font â€“ my partner likes it and wants to use it for her letterhead, but I have no idea what it is.

Thank you so much!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100405192301im_/http:/typophile.com/files/debra_4857.png)
author: brendanmcguigan

comments.content:
House Casual, from the Sign Painter Kit:

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit](http://web.archive.org/web/20100405192301/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit")
It's a House-tastic day for font IDs! (That's 3 so far...)
Oops, you beat me to it.
